issue.title: dzen.ru

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
This issue is known to be solved with [AdGuard Extra](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdGuardExtra) userscript.

issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Tweets like below on Twitter homepage are missing after enabling "`AdGuard Annoyances`" list on uBlock Origin.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42044258/198838344-73ac514c-c35a-4e28-8a4e-be4ef64137ba.png)

Disabling that list solves the problem.

### Proposed solution

I don't want to remove those tweets. Is there anyway I can disable this rule without disabling the list.

### Additional information

_No response_

issue.title: twitter.com
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

Tweets like below on Twitter homepage are missing after enabling "`AdGuard Annoyances`" list on uBlock Origin.
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/42044258/198838344-73ac514c-c35a-4e28-8a4e-be4ef64137ba.png)

Disabling that list solves the problem.

### Proposed solution

I don't want to remove those tweets. Is there anyway I can disable this rule without disabling the list.

### Additional information

_No response_

comment.body:
Solved it:
`twitter.com#@#section[aria-labelledby][role="region"] > div[aria-label] > div[style] > div[style^="transform: translate"] article[data-testid="tweet"]:has(> div[class] > div[class] > div[class] a[href^="/i/topics"][dir="auto"])`
